alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kendall (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:28PM CDT until April 19 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kendall County in northeastern Illinois... Northeastern Grundy County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Shorewood, or 7 miles northwest of Minooka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Aurora, Joliet, Plainfield, Oswego, Yorkville, Channahon, Minooka, Montgomery, Boulder Hill and Plattville. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 117 and 122. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
